title: Wishing Everyone a Most Blessed Christmas
post: Christmas must be consider has the Feast of the Incarnation of God into our humanity.  Because the Shroud is for me a proof of the Incarnation (for me, it’s one of his most important message), I think Christmas his a pretty special time to reflect and meditate upon the Shroud of Turin…  I really believe this aspect of the Shroud (the proof of the Incarnation of God) is one of the aspect that his too often forget by those who believe it is authentic.  I think this aspect of the Shroud tell us more about who God really is than the image formation process, whatever it was…
